body.name: VECELO Queen Bed Frame with PU Upholstered Headboard, Heavy Duty Platform Bedframes, Metal Slats Support, No Box Spring Needed, Matter Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 2 hrs 35 mins
features: [Modern Minimalist Style]: Thoughtfully crafted, classic square-stitched and sleek lines show a headboard embodying a modern and minimalist style. The queen bed frame with black PU upholstered headboard add a touch of Lavish to your bedroom.

[Comfort Headboard Design]: PU leather and memory foam is a standout feature of this headboard, providing a comfortable resting area. Whether reading a book or watching TV, it provides soft support for your head and waist.

[Sturdy Foundation]: This queen size bed frame is built of 13 heavy-duty metal slats, side rails, and 9 reliable legs providing unwavering stability, effortlessly supporting memory foam, or spring mattress (No Box Spring Needed) for relaxing sleep. (Maximum capacity: 650 lbs)

[Under-bed Storage Space]: Experience a clean bedroom with this bed frame queen size that offers a clever storage solution. At a generous 12-inch height, it provides ample space for storing your suitcase, off-season clothing, or other sundries, helping you maintain a tidy living space.

[Noise-Free Experience]: The construction of this queen bed frame ensures a noise-free experience throughout the night, thanks to its minimal screw requirement, quick-lock snag-on installation and EVA sponge. Rest assured, you won't be disturbed by any sudden squeaky noises while sleeping.
body.description: This metal bed Frame combines a stylish look with stable support. PU upholstered headboard and metal frames give the bed frame an overall softer and warmer feel. The slats are metal and foldable design making the assembly easier. It is ideal for those who value practicality and comfort in their bedroom! You will be pleasantly surprised when you get this bed. Sparkle Point + Heavy-duty metal bed frame + No box spring is needed + Get a PU leather upholstered headboard + Adds some flair to an otherwise bland room

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Upgrade your bedroom with this minimalist queen size bed frame with PU upholstered headboard! PU Upholstered Headboard12-in of Under-bed Storage SpaceNoise-free and EVA SpongeQuick InstallationFree-shipping30-days Free Return

Features of VECELO Bed Frame for your Bedroom Strong Support Built of 13 heavy-duty metal slats and 9 reliable legs providing unwavering stability, effortlessly supporting memory foam, or spring mattress for a relaxing sleep. Noise-Free Experience EVA sponge on metal slat for noise-free, no squeak, providing you enjoy a quiet sleep after one-day of work. Quick Installation This bed frame features a folding design and quick-lock snag-on slats installation only takes 30 minutes to finish assembling.
Embedded Design --Mattress can be embedded in the bed frame and you do not worry it will slide!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble, very sturdy
reviews.reviewText: I needed a bed frame that could be assembled easily for the times I need to have an additional bedroom for guests. I chose this one because it is fairly lightweight and easy to move around. I was very pleased at the quality of the materials, the simple way the instructions showed how to assemble, and how the parts were packed. Doing it alone, it took me less than one hour to unpack everything and put the bed together. Everything fit perfectly. All the parts were there and they even included extra screws in case any were missing. The padded headboard looks really elegant and high end. The price was very reasonable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Modern looking twin bed.
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my extra room where I sometimes get guests. This bed is great. The right size. Does not take too much space. Also, I like the look of it. It is easy to unpack and assemble. Also, the price seems like a good deal

reviews.reviewerName: NO BS just my honest reviews
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars so far so good so what
reviews.reviewText: Well it arrived pretty quickly all in one long slender box pretty heavy when your recovering still from a broken arm and wrist but too bad' the instructions are straightforward all of the hardware you need is well packaged in a large plastic case and labelled took me about 50 minutes or so to put it all together with the tools they give you and a jacked arm and wrist. looks pretty decent but the headboard could bigger and a bit more padded in my opinion, as far as being sturdy i'm 6'5 abd about 280 ive heard no squeaks or noises or had any issues with it yet but unfortunately i haven't broken it it properly yet so i'll have to see how it goes after a few hours of activity on it..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice product with good quality.Easy to assemble and worth for the money.The frame was light weight easy to carry and move to other places
